videoData.title: A library of minds

nodes.whoTheyAre: When she was only 20 years old, Juliane Gallina became the first woman to serve as the United States Naval Academy’s (USNA) brigade commander. Today, she is a retired Navy leader with more than two decades of service. As IBM’s director of Cognitive Solutions for National Security, she utilizes that expertise to adapt cognitive technology for security purposes

videoData.description: What if you could consult Winston Churchill on a looming international crisis? Or ask Einstein what he thinks about the latest scientific breakthrough? National security expert Juliane Gallina is working on a way to harness the best thinking strategies of all time.
videoData.socialDescription: What if you could consult Winston Churchill on a looming international crisis? Or ask Einstein what he thinks about the latest scientific breakthrough? National security expert Juliane Gallina is working on a way to harness the best thinking strategies of all time.
